Type.Wiki: The emitter type for this light.

Rotation.Wiki: Rotation of the light, in degrees.

LightStartCutoff.Wiki: Distance from start before light appears.

EnableDist.Wiki: Distance required for a light to transition into view. 0 = always enabled.

EnableState_UnkC0.Wiki: The enable state for this light.

DiffuseColor.Wiki: The diffuse color for this light.

DiffusePower.Wiki: The intensity of the diffuse lighting

SpecularColor.Wiki: The specular color for this light.

CastShadows.Wiki: If ON, this light will cast shadows

ShadowColor.Wiki: The color of the shadows for this light.

FlickerIntervalMin.Wiki: For a flicking light, this is the minimal interval between each flicker.

FlickerIntervalMax.Wiki: For a flicking light, this is the minimal interval between each flicker.

FlickerBrightnessMult.Wiki: For a flickering light, the brightness multiplier to apply.
